user.name: PlayTracker
user.description: All of gaming, together. PlayTracker connects to the most popular platforms out there and unites gamer data. All games, achievements, stats - now in one place.

fullText:
Users have unlocked over 100K achievements in Backlog Dungeon - earning cosmetic profile rewards by clearing their vast trove of unfinished games!

To celebrate, we've shipped a highly requested feature: add any game to the Dungeon directly at the default 1x reward modifier. https://t.co/x3zuD4kggj
